iti29:4.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṃ viharati avighātaṃ anupāyāsaṃ apariḷāhaṃ;
iti29:4.2: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā.
iti29:4.4: Indriyesu guttadvāratāya ca, bhojane mattaññutāya ca.
iti29:4.5: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṃ viharati avighātaṃ anupāyāsaṃ apariḷāhaṃ;
iti29:4.6: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
iti29:8.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
